title: Can't alt tab OR access other windows, even windowed
body:
I typically play my game borderless fullscreen OR windowed mode. Recently, after an initial alt+tab, the game with take focus and NOT release it.

I cannot ctrl+alt+delete, alt+tab, windows+tab, or any combination of keys. League simply locks focus.

Core i3-6300
16 GB Ballistix Sport
R9 390 @ 2560x1440 144hz

Any suggestions? Googling brings up similar results (cannot alt tab) but their issue is easily fixed by switching to windowed...they aren't getting a focus lock.

replies.body: This issue can come up if you're running any 3rd party applications?  To start, I recommend removing any applications you could have running like overlays for league.  Let me know if that does the trick.
I had curse installed. I uninstalled curse with no difference.
